previous.name: Sets of Eleven on Training, Etc.

segments.pli: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
segments.en: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.

segments.pli: Atha kho bhagavā parittaṃ nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsuṃ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
segments.en: Then the Buddha, picking up a little bit of dirt under his fingernail, addressed the mendicants:

segments.pli: katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ, yo vāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito, ayaṃ vā mahāpathavī”ti?
segments.en: Which is more: the little bit of dirt under my fingernail, or this great earth?”
“Sir, the great earth is far more.

segments.pli: Appamattako bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito.
segments.en: The little bit of dirt under your fingernail is tiny.

segments.pli: Neva satimaṃ kalaṃ upeti na sahassimaṃ kalaṃ upeti na satasahassimaṃ kalaṃ upeti mahāpathaviṃ upanidhāya bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito”ti.
segments.en: Compared to the great earth, it’s not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part.”

segments.pli: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa abhisametāvino etadeva bahutaraṃ dukkhaṃ yadidaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ pariyādiṇṇaṃ;
segments.en: “In the same way, for a noble disciple accomplished in view, a person with comprehension, the suffering that’s over and done with is more,

segments.pli: Neva satimaṃ kalaṃ upeti na sahassimaṃ kalaṃ upeti na satasahassimaṃ kalaṃ upeti purimaṃ dukkhakkhandhaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ pariyādiṇṇaṃ upanidhāya yadidaṃ sattakkhattuṃparamatā.
segments.en: Compared to the mass of suffering in the past that’s over and done with, it’s not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part, since there are at most seven more lives.
That’s how very beneficial it is to comprehend the teaching
and gain the vision of the teaching.”

suttaplex.blurb: For someone who has seen the truth, the suffering eliminated is like the great earth; what remains is like the dirt under a fingernail.
